meanings.definition: A type of wooden ship with smooth hull planks
meanings.sent1: The carvels sailed gracefully across the sea.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed several carvels from different eras.
meanings.sent3: The carvels lined up in the harbor, looking like a fleet of wooden giants.
meanings.sent4: The carvels stood out among the other ships with their sleek design.
meanings.sent5: The carvels were a sight to behold, their craftsmanship evident in every plank.

meanings.definition: The plural form of carvel, referring to multiple carvel ships.
meanings.sent1: We marveled at the collection of carvels in the maritime museum.
meanings.sent2: The carvels in the harbor bobbed gently in the water.
meanings.sent3: The carvels seemed to whisper stories of their voyages to each other.
meanings.sent4: The carvels dotted the horizon, a beautiful sight against the setting sun.
meanings.sent5: The carvels were a reminder of a bygone era of seafaring adventure.
